sentences: Co-Chair Børsting highlighted the contact group s focus on the CDM s operational aspects, including geographic distribution.
He explained that the structure of the draft text is similar to that of previous COP/MOP decisions.

He noted, inter alia , requests to the CDM Executive Board to: emphasize its executive and supervisory role; increase transparency; complete as a highest priority revision of the DOE accreditation process; and streamline procedures for countries with fewer than five projects.
BRAZIL outlined his proposal to expand eligibility criteria for afforestation and reforestation activities.
